description: A key analyst during the Atlanta cheating scandal tells us what can be done about cheating as Common Core standards […]
contentencoded:
A key analyst during the Atlanta cheating scandal tells us what can be done about cheating as Common Core standards come online.


Guest: Andy Porter, Dean, University of Pennsylvania Graduate School of Education.
